keyword: how many calories in french toast
title: How Many Calories in French Toast?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in french toast per slice, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition details for better meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories in French Toast?
assumptions: Standard 1 slice (65g) made with white bread, egg-milk batter, pan-fried in minimal butter; no toppings like syrup or fruit.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, batter recipe, cooking fat, and portion size. Check labels or recipes for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One slice of French toast contains about 159 calories and 5.7 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged or restaurant items.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat bread instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of french toast?
faqs.a: Approximately 159 kcal for a standard slice without toppings.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in french toast?
faqs.a: About 18.4 g carbs per slice, mostly from the bread.

faqs.q: Is french toast high in protein?
faqs.a: It provides 5.7 g protein per slice from the eggs and bread.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in french toast?
faqs.a: Baking instead of frying reduces fat and calories by up to 30 kcal per slice.

faqs.q: Are there low-calorie versions of french toast?
faqs.a: Yes, using low-fat milk, whole grain bread, and no added fat can lower it to around 120 kcal per slice.
